been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. "Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up," Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games

He was roundly criticized for his string of 40-point games as a rookie, accused of padding his stats in a push for the Rookie of the Year award-- which he won. Allen Iverson 's response this time: I don't mind taking 40 shots. That's what I do.
